cancellationPolicies.label: Free Cancellation rates
cancellationPolicies.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 9th Nov 2025 (AEDT) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 9th Nov 2025 (AEDT) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.

cancellationPolicies.label: Non-refundable rates
cancellationPolicies.description: Your booking is non-refundable. If you choose to cancel your booking, or in the case of a no-show, you will still be charged the full cost of your booking.

dorms.name: Basic 4 Bed Mixed Dorm
dorms.description: Dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer mixed accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: A bed, a mozzie net and the rainforest right outside your door - BOOK NOW TO RE-WILD and RE-EARTH TODAY

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

paymentProcedure.label: Non-refundable
paymentProcedure.description:
Non-refundable
Your booking is non-refundable. The property will charge you the full amount at any time after your booking confirmation, even if you cancel or donâ€™t show up.

privates.name: Basic Twin Room Private Shared Bathroom
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: Perfect for friends who don't want to share with others our Jungle Twins have two single beds with mozzie nets and towels.They have a verandah with tables and chairs looking out to the rainforest and are just metres from the shared toilet and shower block

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

privates.name: Standard Double Bed Private Shared Bathroom
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: Just the thing for those watching their pennies but not willing to share, these rooms offer privacy without expense.  Each one has a double bed with mozzie nets that open out onto a verandah showcasing the rainforest.  Toilet and showers metres away

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.
